definition: to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
to sculpt/to carve/musical instrument (old)
to walk (side part of split character)
to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
to investigate/to look into
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
to chase/to pursue vigorously
to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
to add something extra/an additional increment/addendum/to append/an additional posthumous title
to pursue/to chase after/to accelerate/to catch up with/to overtake
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down
lit. to go upstream/to trace sth back to/to date from
to recover (sth lost or stolen)/to get back
to try to find out/to trace/to track down
to overtake
to follow/to accompany
to pursue/to track down/to search

sentences.english: "I've lost her, " said the Prince, and he returned sadly to the palace.
sentences.chinese: “我把她給追丟了，”王子傷心地回了王宮。

sentences.english: This gives Carlisle a renewed impetus to nail Ripley, his love rival.
sentences.chinese: 這使卡萊爾重新追裏普利，他的愛情對手。

sentences.english: I hold the Cupid's arrow chasing you, you're wearing a bulletproof vest to fly.
sentences.chinese: 我舉着丘比特的箭追呀追，你穿着防彈背心飛呀飛。

sentences.english: I hold the Cupid's arrow chasing you, you're wearing a bulletproof vest to fly.
sentences.chinese: 我舉着丘比特的箭追呀追，你穿着防彈背心飛呀飛。

sentences.english: Port street layout can be traced to the 16th century hero stabbed in Hong Kong was first built.
sentences.chinese: 港口街道佈局可追搠到16世紀英雄港初建時。

sentences.english: Yeah. Being chased is the big one.
sentences.chinese: 是的，很多人都夢見被追。

sentences.english: Last night, I dream, you dreamed of a long run, how to catch up with recovery.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚做夢，夢到你跑的好遠，怎麼追也追不上。
你長期追不到那個女生。

sentences.english: She was soon out of breath,but she continued to run.
sentences.chinese: 只追了一會兒便上氣不接下氣了，但她還是繼續追趕。

sentences.english: The dog traced a fox to its den.
Really? I thought your hobby was chasing girls.
sentences.chinese: 真的嗎？我還以爲你的愛好是追女孩子呢。

sentences.english: Master the skill of making money, do run after it but don't run after it blindfolded.
sentences.chinese: 掌握技能的賺錢，做它，但不要追追它。

sentences.english: Master the skill of making money, do run after it but don't run after it blindfolded.
sentences.chinese: 掌握技能的賺錢，做它，但不要追追它。

sentences.english: Over the green and yellow rice-fields sweep the shadows of the autumn clouds followed by the swift chasing sun.
sentences.chinese: 黃綠的稻田上掠過秋雲的陰影，後面是狂追的太陽。

sentences.english: Would  you  chase  me  if  I  did?
sentences.chinese: 如果我逃開了，你會來追嗎？

sentences.english: Invest in some interactive toys such as a fishing-pole line for him to chase.
sentences.chinese: 搞一些互動的玩具比如說給他一個釣竿線去追。
